Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with wait times of up to 15 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 15 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to track conditions. 

Yellow Line will board/exit via track 2

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
